\section{A two-fluid model with friction}

In order to design a complete model for vortex friction, we need to consider a system of  (at least) two fluids (one of which rotates by forming vortices). 
As a clear, physically motivated, example we will consider the case where we distinguish the flow of matter from that of  heat/entropy, as in He$^4$.
